controls

Class StatusBarStreet

  • java.lang.Object
    • controls.StatusBarStreet

  • public class StatusBarStreet
extends java.lang.Object
    Class StatusBarStreet represents part on the status bar (third part from the top) displaying information about specific selected street (begin coordinates, end coordinates, name).
    Author:
    Michal Rein, Ondřej Motyčka

    • Constructor Detail

      • StatusBarStreet

        public StatusBarStreet(javafx.scene.layout.GridPane statusBar,
                       StreetMap sMHandle)
        Constructor of street's status bar. Create and assign default values and call setStatus() method to create entire layout and set values.
        Parameters:
        statusBar - Status bar handle.
        sMHandle - StreetMap object handle.

    • Method Detail

      • setStatus

        private void setStatus()
        Create layout, labels and choice box. All required values are extracted from StreetMap class.

      • switchStreet

        public void switchStreet(Street street)
        This method is called whenever new street is requested to be displayed on status bar. Previously displayed street must be unhighlight and the new one is highlighted and displayed on status bar.
        Parameters:
        street - New Street object to be displayed.

      • resetStatus

        public void resetStatus()
        Set status to default values.
